duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure buildings and equipment are maintained in a safe, clean, and orderly condition.
Run on-site maintenance program including the painting program (painting/patching/taping) as well as Air Conditioning and plumbing repairs.
Coordinate and monitor work activities, write reports, perform quality, service, and safety inspections.
Track supplies inventory, equipment inventory, maintenance, and repair. Train, supervise, and instruct employees in tasks, safety, policies, and procedures.
Carry out supervisor responsibilities in accordance with company policies and applicable laws. Provide directions and assign tasks to various staff.
Monitor employees for proper use of personal protective equipment, supplies, and equipment. Report employee personnel issues, concerns, and recognition to manager.
Correct at-risk behavior immediately, then report to the manager immediately. Provide recommendations for corrective action on areas that need improvement.

education_certification.credential: Six months to 1-year related experience and/or training; High School diploma or general education degree (GED); or equivalent combination of education and experience
